sense.gloss: number (of long, cylindrical things, movies, trains, home runs, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑夜間↑↓やかん↓、↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓は|↑本数|↑↓ほんすう↓が↑減↑↓へ↓ります。
sdata.e: The trains are less frequent at night time.

sdata.j: ↑夜間↑↓やかん↓、↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓は|↑本数|↑↓ほんすう↓が↑減↑↓へ↓ります。
sdata.e: There aren't as many trains at night.

sdata.j: ↑夜間↑↓やかん↓、↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓は|↑本数|↑↓ほんすう↓が↑減↑↓へ↓ります。
sdata.e: At night, the trains run less frequently.
